title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-Window support for Teams for VDI for Citrix
description:
Users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to view meetings and calls in separate windows from the main Microsoft Teams client. Additionally, meeting and call controls such as mute, video, chat, leave and others will now be located at the top of the meeting window so that they are always available and never block the underlying content.
GA date: May CY2022
